### Installing packages
```{r}
### install systemPipeR
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly=TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("systemPipeR")

### install systemPipeRdata (helper package, may not use)
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly=TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("tgirke/systemPipeRdata", build_vignettes=TRUE, dependencies=TRUE)
```
Neat. Let's load up a vignette in the next notebook.

This is the vignette we'll be starting with. Selected contents will be in the next notebook in this series (01_systemPipeR_exploration.Rmd):
```{r}
download.file("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tgirke/GEN242/gh-pages/_vignettes/11_RNAseqWorkflow/systemPipeRNAseq.Rmd", "systemPipeRNAseq.Rmd")
```
